Created by the renowned House of Cerruti, this elegant men's perfume represents the brand's commitment to quality and timeless style. Founded by Nino Cerruti in 1967, the fashion house expanded into fragrances to complement its sophisticated menswear collection. Cerruti 1881 takes its name from the year the Cerruti family established their textile mill in Biella, Italy. ðŸ”¥

This luxurious fragrance stands alongside other prestigious designer perfumes but maintains its unique identity through its perfect balance of Mediterranean freshness and woody depth.

What is the longevity of Cerruti 1881 Pour Homme EDP?
Cerruti 1881 Pour Homme offers excellent longevity, typically lasting 6-8 hours on the skin. The EDP concentration provides enhanced staying power compared to the EDT version, with the woody base notes creating a subtle, sophisticated scent trail that lingers throughout the day. For maximum longevity, apply to pulse points on well-moisturized skin. âœ¨
